alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 2:52PM MDT until June 20 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR WESTERN CUSTER...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES... At 252 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Newcastle to 6 miles west of Elk Mountain Lookout to near Dewey, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dewey, Elk Mountain Lookout, Moon, Redbank Spring Campground and Jewel Cave National Monument. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
